directions: Cook pasta in large pot of boiling salted water, just until al dente, about 7 to 9 minutes. Drain.
Combine pasta and pesto in large bowl. Stir in mozzarella, tomatoes, Parmesan and olives. Chill until ready to serve. Serve garnished with basil sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package truRoots® Ancient Grains Organic Penne
1 pint grape or cherry tomatoes, halved
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
title: Penne Pesto Pasta Salad
